3. Views¶

3.1. Accounting views¶

class spin_base.views.accounting.AccountDelete(**kwargs)¶

This views handles the request to delete a user account. It’s only accessible by logged user.

delete(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This method gets the request to delete and calls the parent delete after the removement of the user images.

Throw:
OSError: if the images is not found
dispatch(*args, **kwargs)¶
get(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶
get_object()¶
get_success_url()¶
class spin_base.views.accounting.AccountView(**kwargs)¶

This method permits the update of user informations. It handles the timezones, so the user can report dates and time to his locale.

dispatch(*args, **kwargs)¶
form_class¶

alias of UserProfileForm

form_valid(form)¶

This method responds to form valid event and resizes the user image if modified.

get_context_data(**kwargs)¶
get_object()¶
get_success_url()¶
template_name = 'spin_base/accounting/account.html'¶
class spin_base.views.accounting.ActivationView(**kwargs)¶

This view permits the activation of UserProfile.

Raises:
404 errors if the calls doesn’t fit some pre-requisites
dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
get_redirect_url()¶
class spin_base.views.accounting.LoginView(**kwargs)¶

View that handles the login process

dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
form_class¶

alias of LoginForm

form_valid(form)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶
get_success_url()¶
post(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

The post is called when login form is submitted. It validates the requests, then try the login and sets some session informations, such spin_timezone for user .

class spin_base.views.accounting.LogoutView(**kwargs)¶

Destroys the session and return to home, calling the django auth logout function

dispatch(*args, **kwargs)¶
get_redirect_url()¶
permanent = False¶

If True sets a permanent redirect.

class spin_base.views.accounting.PasswordRecovery(**kwargs)¶

This view sends an email to recover the userprofile password. It requires the username, then sends email and send a link with limited lifetime to user.

context_object_name = 'recover'¶
form_class¶

alias of UsernameForm

form_valid(form)¶
get_success_url()¶
post(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Args: request: the WSGI request object args: kwargs:

recovery_key = None¶
send_recovery_mail(user)¶
template_name = 'forms/lost_password.html'¶
class spin_base.views.accounting.RegistrationView(**kwargs)¶

This view handles the registration of a user, creating a profile. When the user is registred it sends an email with activation link.

dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
form_class¶

alias of RegistrationForm

form_valid(form)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶
get_success_url()¶
model¶

alias of UserProfile

send_activation_mail(user)¶
class spin_base.views.accounting.SetNewPassword(**kwargs)¶

This class is callable only if has been requested recovery of password. This validates the url, then a cookie, timestamp-signed and crypted. Only a user which satisfies thes requisites can set a new password.

dispatch(request, *args, **kwargs)¶
form_class¶

alias of PasswordForm

form_valid(form)¶
get_context_data(**kwargs)¶
get_success_url()¶
class spin_base.views.accounting.UsernameRecovery(**kwargs)¶

This view sends an email to recover the username. It requires the email address, then sends an email with the username.

context_object_name = 'recover'¶
form_class¶

alias of EmailForm

form_valid(form)¶
get_success_url()¶
send_recovery_mail(user)¶
template_name = 'forms/lost_username.html'¶

3.2. Spin Views¶

class spin_base.views.spin.CommentSpin(**kwargs)¶

This class permits to add a comment to a spin.

form_class¶

alias of CommentForm

class spin_base.views.spin.CreateSpin(**kwargs)¶

View that handles the creation of a Spin.

form_class¶

alias of SpinForm

class spin_base.views.spin.DeleteComment(**kwargs)¶

View that deletes a comment.

model¶

alias of Comment

class spin_base.views.spin.DeleteSpin(**kwargs)¶

View that deletes spins.

model¶

alias of Spin

class spin_base.views.spin.DetailSpin(**kwargs)¶

This view renders a single spin in detail with all its comments.

class spin_base.views.spin.EditSpin(**kwargs)¶

View that permits to modify a spin.

form_class¶

alias of SpinForm

model¶

alias of Spin

class spin_base.views.spin.PublicSpin(**kwargs)¶

View that renders a list of latest public spins.

model¶

alias of Spin

3.3. Customization Views¶

class spin_base.views.customization.CreateCustomizationView(**kwargs)[source]¶

This view creates a customization look for the app.

form_class¶

alias of CustomizeForm

model¶

alias of Customization

class spin_base.views.customization.CustomizationView(**kwargs)[source]¶

This view dispatches the requests for update and create. It look for a present customization, if not present, calls CreateCustomizationView, else UpdateCustomizationView.

class spin_base.views.customization.RestoreCustomization(**kwargs)[source]¶

Resets the app look.

class spin_base.views.customization.UpdateCustomizationView(**kwargs)[source]¶

This view updates the user customized look for the app.

form_class¶

alias of CustomizeForm

model¶

alias of Customization

3.4. Generic Views¶

class spin_base.views.generic.FollowersList(**kwargs)[source]¶

Displays user’s followers.

class spin_base.views.generic.FollowingList(**kwargs)[source]¶

Displays user’s followings.

class spin_base.views.generic.HomeView(**kwargs)[source]¶

This view displays home page. If user is authenticated this redirects to following and followers’ ribbits page, else this shows the home page with login form and registration one.

template_name = 'spin_base/home_base.html'¶

Class attribute which defines the page to display in response to a user call.

class spin_base.views.generic.ListControl(**kwargs)[source]¶

Utility class that defines the base list actions for followers and followings lists.

class spin_base.views.generic.PublicProfiles(**kwargs)[source]¶

This view displays the public user profiles, so the user can start following someone.

class spin_base.views.generic.UserHomeView(**kwargs)[source]¶

This view displays the home for authenticated users. The home shows the list of latest followers’ spins.

3.5. Relationship Views¶

class spin_base.views.relationship_control.AddBlock(**kwargs)[source]¶

This class manages adding block to user profile.

class spin_base.views.relationship_control.ApproveFollowing(**kwargs)[source]¶

This class permits private users to approve the following requests. If a user wants to disapprove, he should call StopFollow.

class spin_base.views.relationship_control.Follow(**kwargs)[source]¶

This class permits user to follow another one or to ask following.

class spin_base.views.relationship_control.RemoveBlock(**kwargs)[source]¶

This class manages removing block to user profile.

class spin_base.views.relationship_control.StopFollow(**kwargs)[source]¶

This class removes the following relationship from one side of this one.

3.7. Respin Views¶

class spin_base.views.respin.ReSpinView(**kwargs)[source]¶

This view handles the respin operation. It implements only the dispatch method, which contains the logic of the repin.

3.8. Searching Views¶

class spin_base.views.search.Search(**kwargs)[source]¶

View that implements the search operations, including tag search.

3.9. User Views¶

class spin_base.views.user.UserDetail(**kwargs)[source]¶

This class renders a generic user’s profile, managing the different users that could visit this one.

get_context_data(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns the context needed for correct rendering of user’s profile page. It controls all the possible relations between two users.

get_private_user_requests()[source]¶

Provides waiting requests to follow.
